title: Beyond NER: A Comparative Benchmark of Medical BERTS for Multi-Label Adverse Drug Reaction Classification
conference: International Conference on Intelligent Data Analysis and Applications (IDAA 2025)
desc: Explores fine-tuning LLMs and domain-specific Medical BERT architectures for multi-label ADR classification on the PsyTAR dataset. Benchmarked BioBERT, PubMedBERT, and general BERT models.

title: Unfolding Emerging Issues in the Context of Changing Climatic Scenario
desc: Conducted statistical analysis to study emerging issues under changing climatic scenarios. Presented findings at the conference, enhancing data interpretation and analytical skills.
